p: The data obtained were subjected to an Analysis of Variance (ANOVA) while strip-plot design and the mean values were compared by the Tukey’s HSD (honest significant difference) test method using the software SPSS v.21.0 (Version 21.0, IBM SPSS Statistics for Windows, IBM Corporation, Armonk, NY, USA). Probabilities of significance ( p≤ 0.01 or 0.05) were used to test the significance among the main treatment effects, treatment combinations and interactions.
